The Art of Driving Your Competition Crazy

I did not bring enough to read with me on vacation. I have been told there is a book store in Zurich which sells books in English, so hopefully I will find some time to head downtown.

In the mean time, I am finally getting caught up on older items in my aggregator. One that I missed a couple weeks ago is Guy Kawasaki’s The Art of Driving Your Competition Crazy. In his usual list style, Guy lists eight great tips. Tip #5, Turn customers into evangelists should be fairly obvious, but I think it is very often overlooked. This is also a major theme of the Seth video.

Posted on Apr 12, 2006 and tagged as books, life, business
